weather_report:
In the tranquil darkness before dawn, Downtown San Francisco awakens to a serene and mostly clear sky, offering a gentle promise of the day ahead. The temperature hovers around a crisp 46 degrees, accompanied by a soft northwest wind that whispers through the stillness. As the sun rises on this beautiful Christmas Day, expect it to bring warmth and clarity, with the high reaching near 55 degrees before settling into a cool embrace of around 53 in the afternoon. The west-northwest winds are delicate, ranging from 3 to 7 mph, adding a pleasant touch to the morning air.

With the horizon free from fog and the marine layer holding its breath, the city appears to be dressed in a cloak of ethereal light this early morning. As the day unfolds, it beckons you outdoors; perhaps a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or a thoughtful visit to one of the local coffee shops, where you can savor the rich warmth of a freshly brewed cup while watching the world begin to move. Dressing in layers will suit the day’s whims—a light sweater beneath a cozy jacket will ensure comfort against the cool breeze while allowing for a transition from morning chill to midday warmth. Today, embrace the ordinary pleasures; nothing feels clichéd when wrapped in the simple joy of a sunny, winter day in the City by the Bay.
